recipe.title: Cheddar Horseradish Spread
ingredients: 2 cups coarsely grated extra-sharp white Cheddar
Accompaniment: celery sticks, crackers, or crusty bread
instructions: Stir together all ingredients with 1/4 teaspoon each of salt and pepper.
Stir together all ingredients with 1/4 teaspoon each of salt and pepper.
